allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(core\): add TypeScript types and Zustand stores \(Phase 1 complete\)

- Add all type definitions: user, profile, basicContext, retirementVision,
  planningPreferences, riskComfort, financialSnapshot, systemClassifications,
  client, discovery, and common types
- Create Zustand stores: userStore, profileStore, clientStore, uiStore
- Configure all routes with placeholder pages for consumer and advisor flows
- Update MVP_TRACKER.md with Phase 1 completion status

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
